title: Are pet owners abusing animals to get opioids?

title_detail.value: Are pet owners abusing animals to get opioids?

summary: Veterinarians in Colorado are concerned that some of their clients may have intentionally hurt their pets in the hopes of receiving prescription painkillers, according to a recent survey.

summary_detail.value: Veterinarians in Colorado are concerned that some of their clients may have intentionally hurt their pets in the hopes of receiving prescription painkillers, according to a recent survey.
